```{r}
lines <- readLines("Advent11.txt")

edges <- lapply(lines, function(line) {
  sp <- strsplit(line, ":")[[1]]
  src <- trimws(sp[1])
  tg <- trimws(sp[2])
  if (nchar(tg) == 0) return(NULL)
  tg <- strsplit(tg, " +")[[1]]
  data.frame(from = src, to = tg, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
})

edges <- do.call(rbind, edges)

adj <- split(edges$to, edges$from)

count_paths <- function(start, target, visited = character()) {
  if (start == target) return(1)
  if (!start %in% names(adj)) return(0)

  total <- 0
  for (nxt in adj[[start]]) {
    if (!(nxt %in% visited)) {
      total <- total + count_paths(nxt, target, c(visited, start))
    }
  }
  total
}

count_paths("you", "out")
```
